title: O-GlcNAc modification in endothelial cells modulates adiposity via fat absorption from the intestine in mice
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Seiichiro Ohgaku, Shogo Ida, Natsuko Ohashi, Katsutaro Morino, Atsushi Ishikado, Tsuyoshi Yanagimachi, Koichiro Murata, Daisuke Sato, Satoshi Ugi, Ali Nasiri, Gerald I. Shulman, Hiroshi Maegawa, Shinji Kume, Yukihiro Fujita
